review: Every time you request an SMS code, it fails to arrive, making it impossible for people to make transactions. Having an app is pointless if it's so difficult to access.

review: Users have been utilizing fingerprints. At present, access is restricted as the password and username have been forgotten. No alternative methods are available to unlock it. As technology evolves, you now have the options of using fingerprints, facial recognition, barcode scans of e-KTP IDs, email, and phone numbers. This process even requests a lengthy account number that hasn't been provided, as well as account books and ATM cards. If retrieval involves visiting the bank, registering online to open savings seems redundant. Suggestion: Expand your knowledge.
replyContent: Dear BANK Friend, if your Internet Banking service is deactivated and you recall your User ID and registered Email, please reactivate BANKApp by selecting the Forgot Password option.
